HDG.IM.content: spiritual fate of the West (lose strength to observe decline) [aside on technological stupidity]: when time is nothing but speed, when a boxer counts as the great man of a people [Heidegger’s racism?]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: spiritual fate of the West (lose strength to observe decline) [aside on technological stupidity]: when time is nothing but speed, when a boxer counts as the great man of a people [Heidegger’s racism?]

HDG.IM.content: is Being a mere word or does it hold spiritual fate of the West? > this question may sound forced [method: demonstrate by way of assertion] [but the bell tolls, and we count wrong—even our experience of the question]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: is Being a mere word or does it hold spiritual fate of the West? > this question may sound forced [method: demonstrate by way of assertion] [but the bell tolls, and we count wrong—even our experience of the question]

HDG.LP.content: solitude (Einsame) carries soul toward the One (Einzigen), the burden (Schwere) of fate: carry the soul toward the spirit > soul’s melancholy glows when Soul in journey enters the widest width of its properness (ihres eigenen), which is wandering > soul’s greatness, achieve flaming vision (Anschauen), becomes at home (proper) in pain [pain as MOP?]: pain’s nature is in itself converse (gegenwendiges)
HDG.LP.linkedContent: solitude (Einsame) carries soul toward the One (Einzigen), the burden (Schwere) of fate: carry the soul toward the spirit > soul’s melancholy glows when Soul in journey enters the widest width of its properness (ihres eigenen), which is wandering > soul’s greatness, achieve flaming vision (Anschauen), becomes at home (proper) in pain [pain as MOP?]: pain’s nature is in itself converse (gegenwendiges)

HDG.OHF.content: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]

HDG.OHF.content: since Parmenides [does his reading of Parmenides change?], “perceptual mean-ing (vernehmendes Vermeinen)” and Being are the same [noien and einai], 1st fundamental insight (Grundeinsicht) of idealism (traditional ontology/logic stand w/in the fate of Parmenidean interpretation) (no accident Husserl still characterizing intentionality as “noetic”) > recovering (Gewinnung) a primordial situation presupposes critique of development of intellectual history
